text.section: Except as provided in § 12-208 of this subtitle, each pre-existing authority continues to exist.

section.section:
Except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection, a pre-existing authority governed only by this title:
may exercise the powers granted by Subtitles 6 and 7 and §§ 12-501, 12-502, 12-504, and 12-506(a) of this title; and
if it adopts articles of organization, may exercise the powers listed in § 12-503 of this title that are authorized by the articles of organization in accordance with § 12-205(b)(1)(vi) of this subtitle; and
is entitled to the exemptions from State law provided in § 12-505 of this title.
If articles of organization are adopted, the powers set forth in §§ 12-501 through 12-506(a) of this title may be limited to the extent allowed under §§ 12-205(b)(2) and 12-207 of this subtitle.
